title: Manage Employee Training Records
description: An HSE administrator needs to ensure that all employees have completed their annual safety refresher training.

tasks.description: Run a report from the learning management system (LMS) to identify any employees whose safety refresher training is expired or due to expire.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of non-compliant employees is generated.

tasks.description: Automatically send reminder notifications to the employees and their supervisors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Reminders are sent to all affected employees.

tasks.description: Schedule the non-compliant employees into the next available safety refresher training session.
tasks.expected_outcome: All employees are scheduled for training, ensuring the site remains 100% compliant.
